Name: Russian Roads
About the game: 'Russian Roads' - this is amazing race on rough roads, on the dirt road and in the mud. Travel in different cars of the Russian car industry and try to come first! Upgrade auto buying him new parts for the engine. Buy new wheels. Paint car in your favorite color! Discover new car in your own garage. Try yourself in the role of a driver on Russian roads. Key features: - This game has passed Greenlight and is now in her fall card! - 2 cars for the races. - Improve the appearance and performance of the vehicle.
